member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_PICTURE_CONTROL_DESC
member.summary: Describes a video encoder picture control.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_PICTURE_CONTROL_DESC.IntraRefreshFrameIndex
member.summary: When requesting an intra-refresh wave for IntraRefreshFramesDuration frames by specifying the flag, this value indicates, for the current picture, the index of the frame in the intra-refresh wave. The value range is set by the host between 0 and to hint the status of the intra-refresh session to the driver.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_PICTURE_CONTROL_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A bitwise OR combination of values from the enumeration specifying the picture control descriptor flags.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_PICTURE_CONTROL_DESC.PictureControlCodecData
member.summary: A structure containing codec-specific picture control data. Depending of the selected rate control mode the QP values are interpreted differently.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_PICTURE_CONTROL_DESC.ReferenceFrames
member.summary: A structure containing the reconstructed pictures from the past encoding operations outputs.
